name: ALAKAJAM11 beta
description:
This is the beta version of my Jam game for ALAKAJAM! #12

final Version is the final submission

controls:

arrow keys to move and jump

a and d to switch active player

every player has their unique ability:

- high jump

- climbing

- diving

the goal is to reach the invisible transition zone at the end of each level

Due to a lack of time i was not able to do more levels, different colored characters, more menus or more animations than a walking animation  :-(
